name: bablyfill
description: polyfill to run esnext code in node

scripts.example:
echo "running this code with bablyfill
" && tail ./example/es6-app.js && node ./example
scripts.pure:
echo "running this code with node
" && tail ./example/es6-app.js && node ./example/es6-app
